## Problem

What user or developer problem are we trying to solve?

## Proposed solution

Describe the desired behavior or design.

## Alternatives considered

List alternatives and why they are less suitable.

## Scope

- Affected area: client / server / models / dashboard / docs
- Breaking changes expected: yes / no

## Additional context

Examples, mockups, links, or references.
